程序包 controller

类 PharmacistController

Object
PharmacistController
public class PharmacistController extends Object
The PharmacistController class provides Pharmacists with methods for managing appointment outcome records, approving prescription requests, getting medicine inventory, and submitting replenishment requests.

It depends on AppointmentOutcomeRecord, Medicine, Prescription, AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore, and MedicineStore.

  • 构造器详细资料

  • 方法详细资料

    • getAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public static AppointmentOutcomeRecord getAppointmentOutcomeRecord(String appointmentOutcomeRecordedId) throws Exception
      Gets the appointment outcome record with the specified ID.
      参数:
      appointmentOutcomeRecordedId - the ID of the appointment outcome record
      返回:
      the appointment outcome record with the specified ID
      抛出:
      Exception - if the appointment outcome record is not found

    • approvePrescriptionRequest

      public static void approvePrescriptionRequest(String appointmentOutcomeRecordId, int prescriptionIdx) throws Exception
      Dispense a prescription of an appointment outcome record.
      参数:
      appointmentOutcomeRecordId - the ID of the appointment outcome record
      prescriptionIdx - the index of the prescription to be dispensed in the prescription list of the appointment outcome record
      抛出:
      Exception - if the appointment outcome record is not found or the prescription index is out of bounds

    • getMedicineInventory

      public static List<Medicine> getMedicineInventory()
      Gets the list of medicines in the inventory.
      返回:
      the list of medicines in the inventory

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public static void submitReplenishmentRequest(String medicinedId) throws Exception
      Submits a medicine replenishment request for the medicine with the specified ID.
      参数:
      medicinedId - the ID of the medicine
      抛出:
      Exception - if the medicine is not found or the medicine is not below the low stock level alert line
